# Summoner (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** You cast all conjuration (summoning) and conjuration (calling) spells at +2 caster level.

**Summoner Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Summon Monster I (Spell)|Summon Monster I]]****:** Calls extraplanar creature to fight for you.

**2** **[[Summon Monster II (Spell)|Summon Monster II]]****:** Calls extraplanar creature to fight for you.

**3** **[[Summon Monster III (Spell)|Summon Monster III]]****:** Calls extraplanar creature to fight for you.

**4** **[[Planar Ally, Lesser (Spell)|Planar Ally, Lesser]]** **<sup>X</sup>:** Exchange services with a 6 HD extraplanar creature.

**5** **[[Summon Monster V (Spell)|Summon Monster V]]****:** Calls extraplanar creature to fight for you.

**6** **[[Planar Ally (Spell)|Planar Ally]]****:** As *[[Planar Ally, Lesser (Spell)|lesser planar ally]]**,* but up to 16 HD.

**7** **[[Summon Monster VII (Spell)|Summon Monster VII]]****:** Calls extraplanar creature to fight for you.

**8** **[[Planar Ally, Greater (Spell)|Planar Ally, Greater]]****:** As *[[Planar Ally, Lesser (Spell)|lesser planar ally]]**,* but up to 24 HD.

**9 [[Gate (Spell)|Gate]] <sup>X</sup>:** Connects two planes for travel or summoning.
